
调用流程

1   search          搜索机票                http://123.206.254.186:8080/flight/search           POST
2   price           查询指定航班价格         http://123.206.254.186:8080/flight/price            POST
3   book            预订指定渠道的航班       http://123.206.254.186:8080/flight/book             POST
4   order           下单                   http://123.206.254.186:8080/flight/order             POST
5   pay             支付                   http://123.206.254.186:8080/flight/pay               POST
6   order_detail    订单详情                http://123.206.254.186:8080/flight/order_detail      POST
7   refund_apply    退票费用查询            http://123.206.254.186:8080/flight/refund_apply       POST
